definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
bovine spongiform encephalopathy, BSE/mad cow disease
pinyin: niu2 hai3 mian2 zhuang4 nao3 bing4

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathological characteristics of heroin spongiform leukoencephalopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解海洛因海綿狀白質腦病的病理特徵。

sentences.english: Pregnancy and estrogen-based medications can cause cavernous hemangiomas to grow.
sentences.chinese: 妊娠和雌激素藥物可能導致的海綿狀血管瘤增長。

sentences.english: Along with the clinical improvement the spongiform pustules vanished, and the inflammation in dermis also lessened.
sentences.chinese: 治療後表皮內海綿狀膿皰消失，真皮炎症有所減輕。

sentences.english: Diagnosis and Treatment for the Giant Cavernous Hemangiomas in the Middle Fossa.
sentences.chinese: 中顱凹底巨大海綿狀血管瘤的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate methods of microsurgical treatment for cases of intracranial cavernous hemangioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱內海綿狀血管瘤顯微手術治療方法。

sentences.english: Seed Chang Sanleng shape, constant involute be in a fungous fiber plastid inside.
sentences.chinese: 種子常三棱狀，常內卷在具海綿狀纖維質體內。

sentences.english: I gave up eating all beef when I first heard of BSE.
sentences.chinese: 我首次聽說牛海綿狀腦病後便不再喫任何牛肉。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the experiences in microneurosurgical treatment of spinal cord cavernous hemangiomas ( SCH).
sentences.chinese: 目的總結脊髓海綿狀血管瘤顯微外科治療的經驗。

sentences.english: Methods The artifical sponginess skin can be obtained from the effervesced chitin.
sentences.chinese: 方法市售甲殼素經發泡技術製成海綿狀人工皮。

sentences.english: The extracted collagen was white, with no smell. The collagen membrane was white, sponge-like and elastic.
sentences.chinese: 凍幹交聯膠原膜呈白色海綿狀，具有一定彈性。

sentences.english: Objective To probe manifestations of cerebral cavernous angioma on MRI image as well as their diagnostic value.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦海綿狀血管瘤的MRI表現及診斷價值。

sentences.english: Spongy degeneration was apparent with brain biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 腦病理檢查表現爲海綿狀變性。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of cavernoma of urethra cavernosum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討尿道海綿體海綿狀血管瘤的診斷及治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study imaging features of dural cavernous angiomas .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討硬腦膜海綿狀血管瘤的影像學特徵。
